title: Royal Roader on My Own - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Sci-fi   Shounen   Sports   Supernatural
tags: Blacksmith   Business Management   Demon Lord   Demons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fairies   Famous Protagonist   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Management   Modern Day   Monsters   Parallel Worlds   Poor to Rich   Proactive Protagonist   Skill Creation   S*aves   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Transported into a Game World   Weak to Strong
author: Park Sung Yun
description:
‘Royal Roader,’ the game that I ruled as an overlord was ending its service. Shit! It was my life’s only pleasure.

The last day! I used all of my strength and in-game connections to defeat the final boss monster, Demon Heros.

As a reward, I earned a Marble of Wishes.

[Please state your wish.]
My wish? [Royal Roader’s renewal as reality.]
I was just joking. I really only wrote it as a joke…>
